name: Voice Cloning with Tacotron2
desc: A scaleable approach to cloning voices using Tacotron2 and WaveGlow model architectures. Listen to an example inference by hovering over the seashell.

name: Marketplace Pricing Reco. Engine
desc: Deployed models that make marketplace pricing personalized, seamless, and intelligent. Complete the form to get a recommended budget and see how many responses you can expect to receive.

name: Analytics for Working Professionals
desc: Developed and presented a 4-session course to improve organizational productivity by cultivating analytical fluency.

name: Globalization of the Voice Over Gig Economy
desc: Analysis of the interactions between voice talent and clients across the globe using Tableau.
